title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, March 4, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of author Khaled Hosseini, born in Kabul, Afghanistan, in 1965. His breakout novel “The Kite Runner” sold over 1 million copies in 2 years.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
